mapper.update: update accompany_board set title = #{title}, n_id = #{nId}, c_id = #{cId}, t_type_id = #{tTypeId}, contents = #{contents}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, want_age = #{wantAge}, want_gender = #{wantGender}, deadline_toggle = #{deadlineToggle}, update_date = now() where ac_board_id = #{acBoardId}
